gr.agroscape.contexts

Class MainContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<T>
      • repast.simphony.context.AbstractContext<T>
        • repast.simphony.context.SmallDefaultContext<T>
          • repast.simphony.context.DefaultContext<java.lang.Object>
            • gr.agroscape.contexts.MainContext
  • Type Parameters:
    Object -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Object>, java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object>, repast.simphony.context.Context<java.lang.Object>, repast.simphony.context.ContextListener, repast.simphony.context.RepastElement

    public class MainContext
extends repast.simphony.context.DefaultContext<java.lang.Object>
    This is the MainContext. Everything is included here.
    It contains:
    • The crops that are available within Agroscape. They are inside the CropsContext. The Crops Collection can directly be accessed by callling the static getAvailableCrops()
    • The plots that are available. They are inside the PlotsContext. The Plots Collection can directly be accessed by callling the static getAvailablePlots()
    • The available farmers. They are inside the FarmersContext.
    • The LandPropertyRegistry. It is available through getLandPropertyRegistry().
    • The PaymentAuthority. It is available through getPaymentAuthority().
    Author:
    jkr
